### Abstract of my first cool idea {-}

My first idea revolves around the use of new data science techniques to solve one of the biggest challenges in urban planning: Traffic!  The aim is to use cutting edge techniques to empower stakeholders to employ dynamic pricing in order to achieve some outcome (Reduced traffic, increased taxes, etc.)

## About the author {-}

Clayton Leach is a student in the Berkeley MIDS program in the Spring 2018 Cohort.  He lives in Philadelphia, PA  (Go Eagles!) where he works in advertising technology as a product analyst.  Upon completion of the MIDS program Clayton hopes to gain employment as a data science.
